Dr. S.S Mohapatra, M.P and Chairman Foreign Affairs Club of India is Discussing progress of The foreign affairs club with (1) S.D Sharma, President of India (2) Giani Zail Singh, President of India (3)H.D Deve Gowda, Prime minister of India (4) Dr. K.R Narayanan, President of India (5) R. Venkatraman, President of India (6) A.P.J Abdul Kalam, President of India.

Dr. S.S Mohapatra, M.P and Chairman of Foreign Affairs Club of India  Discussing the progress of The foreign affairs club with Dignitaries.

  1. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with kourt Waldham, President of Austria and Secretary general of United Nations.
  2. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Hans Lunder, President of International Peace organization.
  3. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Peter Yusuf, Information Minister of Iraq
  4. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Mr. Kim il Sung, President of North Korea.
  5. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Askaier akayv, President of kirzistan.
  6. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Saddam Hussien, President of Iraq and Giani Zail Singh, President of India.
  7. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Mr. Rodri Gus, President of Costarica.
  8. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with Danial Ortega, President of Nicaraua.
  9. Dr. S.S Mohaptra M.P is seen with President Kenya.
